test-set.name: output
test-set.description: Tests the xsl:output declaration, and hence serialization generally

test-case.name: output-0101
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in HTML output when @escape-uri-attributes= yes.

test-case.name: output-0102a
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

test-case.name: output-0102b
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

test-case.name: output-0102c
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

modified.change: added variant with hex encoding of character references

test-case.name: output-0102d
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

test-case.name: output-0102e
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

test-case.name: output-0102f
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=yes.

test-case.name: output-0103a
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

test-case.name: output-0103b
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

test-case.name: output-0103c
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

modified.change: added variant with hex encoding of character references

test-case.name: output-0103d
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

test-case.name: output-0103e
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

test-case.name: output-0103f
test-case.description: Test escaping of non-ASCII characters in XHTML output, @escape-uri-attributes=no.

test-case.name: output-0104
test-case.description: Test avoidance of apos entity for XHTML output

test-case.name: output-0105
test-case.description: Test with XHTML output method. The document element name is 'html' in the null namespace.

test-case.name: output-0106
test-case.description: Test with XHTML output where the stylesheet has a default namespace defined on the html element itself.

test-case.name: output-0107
test-case.description: Test for SCRIPT handling with XHTML output method.

test-case.name: output-0108
test-case.description: Test for STYLE handling with XHTML output method.

test-case.name: output-0109
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method with an empty html tag

test-case.name: output-0110
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method with omit-xml-declaration=yes.

test-case.name: output-0111
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @doctype-system only.

test-case.name: output-0112
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @doctype-public only. Show that attribute is ignored.

test-case.name: output-0113
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @doctype-system and @doctype-public

test-case.name: output-0114
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with cdata-section-elements that have ]]

test-case.name: output-0115
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with cdata-section-elements that have ]]>.

test-case.name: output-0116
test-case.description: Test empty elements with empty content model in XHTML output and @indent=no.

test-case.name: output-0117
test-case.description: Boolean attributes should not be output in minimized form.

test-case.name: output-0118
test-case.description: Processing instructions should be terminated with "?>". Output method is XHTML.

test-case.name: output-0119
test-case.description: Simple test of XHTML output with @indent=no

test-case.name: output-0120
test-case.description: Test of cdata-section-elements processing. <example> should not be processed.

test-case.name: output-0121
test-case.description: Test that the default value of @omit-xml-declaration with XHTML output method is 'no'.

test-case.name: output-0122
test-case.description: All xsl:output elements are merged into a single element. While repeats of most attributes are just tested for conflicts, cdata-section-elements will contain the union of the specified values. Both example and test should be wrapped by CDATA, and the output should be XML (since cdata-section-elements only applies to XML).

test-case.name: output-0123
test-case.description: Test HTML output with default value for @include-content-type, the result tree has a 'head' element. (default is 'yes')

test-case.name: output-0124
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type=yes, the result tree has a 'head' element.

test-case.name: output-0125
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type value set to "no".

test-case.name: output-0126
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with default value for @include-content-type, the result tree has a 'head' element in the XHTML namespace and '@media-type="application/xhtml-xml".

test-case.name: output-0127
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with include-content-type=no. The document element of the final result tree is 'html' in the XHTML namespace.

test-case.name: output-0128
test-case.description: Test XML output DOES NOT output a meta tag when include-content-type is specified and head element is present

test-case.name: output-0129
test-case.description: Test Text output DOES NOT output a meta tag when include-content-type is specified and head element is present

test-case.name: output-0130
test-case.description: Test with no output method explicitly specified and the document element of the implicit result tree is html in the XHTML namespace. Show to output method defaults to XHTML.

test-case.name: output-0131
test-case.description: Test serialization of invalid XHTML. Not an error.

test-case.name: output-0132
test-case.description: Test with NCName for @name and xsl:output method=xhtml. Use the named output definition in xsl:result document.

test-case.name: output-0133
test-case.description: Test with prefixed local name for @name and xsl:output method=xhtml.Use the named output definition in xsl:result document.

test-case.name: output-0134
test-case.description: Test with a named and unnamed output definition. Show that the unnamed output definition is used to serialize the implicit final result tree.

test-case.name: output-0135
test-case.description: Show that merging of output declarations is done after expanding the QNames in @name. (use two declarations with the same local name but different prefixes bound to one and the same namespace)

test-case.name: output-0136
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @byte-order-mark=yes. Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0137
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @byte-order-mark=no.Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0138
test-case.description: Test of XHTML output with @cdata-section-elements with a list of names with or without prefixes.

test-case.name: output-0139
test-case.description: Test XHTML output method with @encoding=UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0140
test-case.description: Test XHTML output method with @encoding=UTF-16.

test-case.name: output-0141
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with @escape-uri-attributes=no. Use fn:escape-html-uri to escape some URIs but not all.

test-case.name: output-0142
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with include-content-type=yes, the result tree has a 'head' element in the XHTML namespace and '@media-type="application/xhtml-xml".

test-case.name: output-0143
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with include-content-type=yes and 'meta http-equiv="Content-Type"' tag already present.

test-case.name: output-0144
test-case.description: Test XHTML output with include-content-type=yes and 'meta http-equiv="Content-Type "' tag already present with additional parameters in the 'content' attribute value. Example from spec.

test-case.name: output-0145
test-case.description: Test that @media-type can be specified on output method xhtml. Value used is "application/postscript"

test-case.name: output-0146
test-case.description: Test of XTHML output with @normalization-form=NFC.

test-case.name: output-0147
test-case.description: Test of XTHML output with @normalization-form=none.

test-case.name: output-0148
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method with omit-xml-declaration=no

test-case.name: output-0149
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method @standalone=yes.

test-case.name: output-0150
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method @standalone=no.

test-case.name: output-0151
test-case.description: Test empty elements with non-empty content model in XHTML output.

test-case.name: output-0152
test-case.description: Test for the xhtml output method @standalone=omit.

test-case.name: output-0153
test-case.description: Test XHTML output method with @version=1.0

test-case.name: output-0154
test-case.description: Test HTML output method with illegal content inside the 'script' tag. Example from spec. The escaping must be done manually.

test-case.name: output-0155a
test-case.description: Test that @escape-uri-attributes with XML output method is ignored.

test-case.name: output-0155b
test-case.description: Test that @escape-uri-attributes with XML output method is ignored.

test-case.name: output-0156
test-case.description: Test that @include-content-type with XML output method is ignored.

test-case.name: output-0157
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type=yes and 'meta http-equiv="Content-Type "' tag already present.

test-case.name: output-0158
test-case.description: Test HTML output with include-content-type=yes and 'meta http-equiv="Content-Type "' tag already present with additional parameters in the 'content' attribute value. Example from spec.

test-case.name: output-0159
test-case.description: Test HTML output method with illegal content inside the 'script' tag. Example from spec. The escaping must be done manually.

all-of.serialization-matches: <textarea\s+rows="2"\s+cols="20">\s+The cat was playing in the garden.\s+Suddenly a dog showed up.....\s+</textarea>

test-case.name: output-0160
test-case.description: Test that whitespace is not added or removed adjacent to elements ins and del if they do not contain element children; indent=no with HTML output method.

test-case.name: output-0161
test-case.description: Test of HTML output with @normalization-form=none.

test-case.name: output-0162
test-case.description: Test HTML output with @byte-order-mark=yes.Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0163
test-case.description: Test HTML output with @byte-order-mark=no. Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0164
test-case.description: Test HTML output with default value for @escape-uri-attributes. (default is 'yes')

test-case.name: output-0165
test-case.description: Test XML output with @byte-order-mark=yes.Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0166
test-case.description: Test XML output with @byte-order-mark=no. Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0167
test-case.description: Test of XML output with @normalization-form=NFC.

test-case.name: output-0168
test-case.description: Test of XML output with @normalization-form=none.

test-case.name: output-0169
test-case.description: Test of TEXT output with @normalization-form=NFC.

test-case.name: output-0170
test-case.description: Test of TEXT output with @normalization-form=none.

test-case.name: output-0171
test-case.description: Test TEXT output with @byte-order-mark=yes.Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0172
test-case.description: Test TEXT output with @byte-order-mark=no.Encoding is UTF-8.

test-case.name: output-0173
test-case.description: Test of merging two unnamed output declarations with non-overlapping attributes. (output method is XML)

test-case.name: output-0174
test-case.description: Test of merging two named output declarations with non-overlapping attributes.

test-case.name: output-0175
test-case.description: Test with two named output declarations with the same name and the same import precedence and different values for the same attributes, then a third output declaration with the same name but with higher precedence which sets values for the conflicting attributes. Show that there is no conflict and the third named output declaration is used.

test-case.name: output-0176
test-case.description: Test for disabling output escaping in xsl:text

test-case.name: output-0177
test-case.description: Test for disabling output escaping in xsl:text

test-case.name: output-0178
test-case.description: Test with unsupported value for @encoding, output method is XHTML. Two alternative results, since the serializer is allowed to report the error or recover by using a different encoding.

test-case.name: output-0180
test-case.description: Test with unsupported value for @encoding, output method is XML. Two alternative results, since the serializer is allowed to report the error or recover by using a different encoding.

test-case.name: output-0182
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if @standalone value is other than omit and the instance of the data model contains multiple elements children of the root node.

test-case.name: output-0183
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if @doctype-system is specified and the instance of the data model contains multiple elements children of the root node.

test-case.name: output-0184
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @encoding in output method HTML is not supported.

test-case.name: output-0185
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @encoding in output method TEXT is not supported.

test-case.name: output-0186
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if @omit-xml-declarations="yes" in xsl:output and @standalone is other than 'omit'.

test-case.name: output-0187
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if @omit-xml-declarations="yes" in xsl:output and @version is other than '1.0' and @doctype-system is specified.

test-case.name: output-0188
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised when in xsl:output @method="xml", @undeclare-prefixes="yes", and @version="1.0"

test-case.name: output-0189
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @normalization-form in output method XML is not supported by the serializer.

test-case.name: output-0190
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @normalization-form in output method XHTML is not supported by the serializer.

test-case.name: output-0191
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @normalization-form in output method HTML is not supported by the serializer.

test-case.name: output-0192
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the value of @normalization-form in output method TEXT is not supported by the serializer.

test-case.name: output-0193
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if @normalization-form="fully-normalized" and the result begins with a combining character.

test-case.name: output-0194
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if in xsl:output @method="html" and the value of @version is not supported by the serializer.

test-case.name: output-0195
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the output method is HTML and the result tree contains characters in the #x7F-#x9F range.

test-case.name: output-0196
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised if the output method is HTML and > appears within a processing instruction in the result tree.

test-case.name: output-0197
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @byte-order-mark value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0198
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @escape-uri-attributes value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0199
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @include-content-type value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0201
test-case.description: Simple test for using one character map with the XML output method.

test-case.name: output-0202
test-case.description: Simple test for xsl:character-map and @use-character-maps defined on it.

test-case.name: output-0203
test-case.description: Test xsl:character-map with two different mappings of the same character, one from @use-character-maps and one from xsl:output-character.

test-case.name: output-0204
test-case.description: Test for one imported xsl:character-map, no character maps declared in primary stylesheet.

test-case.name: output-0205
test-case.description: Test for xsl:character-map and @use-character-maps referencing another character map with prefixed name by using a different prefix bound to the same namespace.

test-case.name: output-0206
test-case.description: Simple test for xsl:character-map and @use-character-maps referencing the same character map more than once.

test-case.name: output-0207
test-case.description: Test with two character maps with the same name but with different import precedence. Show that the one with higher precedence is used.

test-case.name: output-0208
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0 DOCTYPE declaration.

test-case.name: output-0209
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0 DOCTYPE declaration.

test-case.name: output-0210
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0 DOCTYPE declaration.

test-case.name: output-0211
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0 DOCTYPE declaration with a namespace prefix (which gets stripped).

test-case.name: output-0212
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0 DOCTYPE declaration. Uses "5.00" as the version, and whitespace before the html element.

test-case.name: output-0213
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: no DOCTYPE declaration because top-level element is not html.

test-case.name: output-0214
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: top-level element in alien namespace.

test-case.name: output-0215
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: top-level element in alien prefixed namespace.

test-case.name: output-0216
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements in XHTML namespace.

test-case.name: output-0217
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements in no namespace.

test-case.name: output-0218
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements with non-empty content model in XHTML namespace.

test-case.name: output-0219
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements with non-empty content model in no namespace.

test-case.name: output-0220
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements with non-empty content model in no namespace, this time with attributes

test-case.name: output-0221
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements with non-empty content model in XHTML namespace, this time with attributes

test-case.name: output-0222
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements in XHTML namespace, with attributes.

test-case.name: output-0223
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: empty elements in no namespace, with attributes.

test-case.name: output-0224
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: SVG and MathML elements using default namespace.

test-case.name: output-0225
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: SVG and MathML elements using non-default namespace.

test-case.name: output-0226
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: SVG elements mixing default and non-default namespace. Assumes resolution of bug 20261.

test-case.name: output-0227
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: doctype-system and doctype-public

test-case.name: output-0228
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: doctype-system and no doctype-public

test-case.name: output-0229
test-case.description: Test XHTML 5.0: doctype-public and no doctype-system. See bug 20264. Current test result assumes no DOCTYPE declaration is output in this situation.

test-case.name: output-0230
test-case.description: Invalid value for html-version

test-case.name: output-0280
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @indent value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0281
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @omit-xml-declaration value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0282
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @standalone value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0283
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @undeclare-prefixes value in xsl:output.

test-case.name: output-0284
test-case.description: Test that an error is raised on invalid @doctype-public value in xsl:output. See XSLT 2.0 Erratum E3

test-case.name: output-0301
test-case.description: Simple test for using character maps with the XHTML output method.

test-case.name: output-0302
test-case.description: Simple test for using character maps with the HTML output method.

test-case.name: output-0303
test-case.description: Simple test for using character maps with the TEXT output method.

test-case.name: output-0304
test-case.description: Test @use-character-maps on xsl:result-document, referencing a character map with prefixed name by using a different prefix bound to the same namespace.

test-case.name: output-0305
test-case.description: Test merging of two xsl:output declaration where the resulting concatenated sequence of all use-character-maps is taken in declaration order.

test-case.name: output-0306
test-case.description: Test merging of two xsl:output declaration where the resulting concatenated sequence of all use-character-maps is taken in order of increasing import precedence.

test-case.name: output-0307
test-case.description: Test with xsl:output that has @use-character-maps and an xsl:result-document that uses this output declaration but includes @use-character-maps on its own. Show that the charactes-maps references in xsl:result-document supplement and take precedence over the ones from the xsl:output declaration.

test-case.name: output-0308
test-case.description: Test of merging two named output declarations with different import precedence and different values for the same attributes. Show that the values from the declaration with higher import precedence takes effect. Attributes tested: -byte-order-mark, escape-uri-attributes, include-content-type, undeclare-prefixes, use-character-maps

test-case.name: output-0309
test-case.description: Simple test for using a list of character maps with the XML output method.

test-case.name: output-0310
test-case.description: Show that text node children of elements present in @cdata-section-elements are not affected by character maps.

test-case.name: output-0311
test-case.description: Use a system identifier in doctype-system that contains a double-quote character

test-case.name: output-0312
test-case.description: Override a system identifier and public identifier using doctype-system="", doctype-public="": see erratum E31

test-case.name: output-0313
test-case.description: Override a system identifier and public identifier using doctype-system="", doctype-public="": see erratum E31

test-case.name: output-0401
test-case.description: Test for disabling output escaping in xsl:value-of

test-case.name: output-0402
test-case.description: Test for disabling output escaping in xsl:value-of

test-case.name: output-0501
test-case.description: Test for missing name in xsl:character-map. Static error
